Class UserInputSystemTest

java.lang.Object
org.testfx.api.FxRobot
org.testfx.framework.junit5.ApplicationTest
Managers.UserInputSystemTest
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.testfx.api.FxRobotInterface, org.testfx.framework.junit5.ApplicationFixture
public class UserInputSystemTest extends org.testfx.framework.junit5.ApplicationTest
Unit tests for the UserInputSystem class. This test class uses TestFX to simulate user inputs and validate the behavior of the UserInputSystem. Source Code: GitHub Link

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach void setUp()
      Sets up the test environment before each test. Mocks dependencies and initializes the UserInputSystem.

    • testMoveUpOnWKeyPressed

      @Test void testMoveUpOnWKeyPressed()
      Tests the behavior when the 'W' key is pressed. Simulates a 'W' key press and verifies that the moveUp method of UserPlane is called.

    • testMoveDownOnSKeyPressed

      @Test void testMoveDownOnSKeyPressed()
      Tests the behavior when the 'S' key is pressed. Simulates an 'S' key press and verifies that the moveDown method of UserPlane is called.

    • testPauseOnEscapeKeyPressed

      @Test void testPauseOnEscapeKeyPressed()
      Tests the behavior when the 'ESCAPE' key is pressed. Simulates an 'ESCAPE' key press and verifies that the timeline is stopped.
